section_purpose: To summarize the paper's key approach of applying neural graph networks to enhance branching heuristics in SAT-solving and to highlight reported performance improvements over standard heuristics.
key_points: Neural graph networks with message-passing architecture and attention mechanism are used.
The branching heuristic in two SAT-solving algorithms is enhanced.
Improvements of learned neural heuristics are reported compared to two standard human-designed heuristics.

architectures: Neural graph networks with message-passing and attention mechanism

dependencies: Basic knowledge of SAT-solving algorithms and neural networks
reproducibility_notes: The specific SAT-solving algorithms are not named in the abstract.
No hyperparameters or dataset details are provided in the abstract.
